createAccess.captionShort: Set a PIN code to access $t(common:appName).

caption.enter: $t(pin:createAccess.captionShort) It will be required every time you open $t(common:appName).
caption.confirm: To confirm the PIN code, enter the same PIN you just entered.

hint.confirm: Input PIN a second time to confirm.

error.confirm: PIN code mismatch, please try again.

deleteAccess.caption: Enter the PIN code to disable it.
deleteAccess.biometrics: When you remove the PIN, the biometrics feature will be automatically disabled.

biometrics.caption: Please authenticate using Face ID or other biometric feature.

use.ios: Or use Face ID or Fingerprint to access the wallet.
use.android: Or use your phone's biometric features to access the wallet.
